sys_hub_input_scripts.script: {"dunning_interval_ms":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"var interval_minutes \u003d gs.getProperty(\u0027x_snc_ham_dunning.interval_minutes\u0027, 1440); // Default 24 hrs\nreturn interval_minutes * 60000; // minutes to msec"}}
